caption.p: Effect of MLVA on reduced glutathione (GSH) content in brain regions of nitrobenzene-induced neurodegenerative rats.

Data are given as mean Â± SD of rats per group. MLVA: methanolic leaf extract of Vernonia amygdalina, a: Values differ significantly from group A (control) (P < 0.05). b: Values differ significantly from group B (nitrobenzene[NB] only); group C (NB + 200 MLVA), group D (NB + 400 MLVA); group E (NB + 400 MLVA).
